name: Mask: A Detective Story
description:
Mask: A Detective Story is the first game I created entirely on my own for a college class project. Using assets that I drew, animated, and programmed, I brought the world to life with an inventory system, notebook tab, character interactions, and two different endings! 

Play as Sam, a detective responding to a call involving a family and a body. It's up to you to help Sam gather the clues and discover who the culprit is - but be warned! You've only got one shot to choose the right person! 

Music: Copyright-free music within the house
